text: 2:16 Matyu 23:32-33; 24:6; Luk 11:52; Aposel 13:50Egha me God ua gumazamizir kaba inian me aghuagha, kamaghɨn e Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba akam e me mɨkɨman me aghuagha, en tuaviba apɨri. Kamaghɨra me zurara arazir kurabagh amima, da ghua bar ekefe, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Godɨn anɨngagharim men izegha gɨfa.
